hero.title: Georgian Young Naturalists’ Tournament (GYNT)
hero.subtitle: Empowering the next generation of Georgian scientists.

about.title: What is GYNT?
about.text: GYNT is Georgia’s first student-led science tournament that blends research, teamwork, and scientific debate. Inspired by international formats like IYNT, GYNT brings Georgian students together to present creative solutions to real-world science problems.

step1.title: Form a Team
step1.desc: Gather 6 passionate students and a teacher-mentor.

step2.title: Tackle Science Problems
step2.desc: Work on open-ended research questions and prepare your defense.

step3.title: Compete in GYNT
step3.desc: Present, challenge, and debate other teams in front of expert jurors.

whyJoin.title: Why Join GYNT?
whyJoin.researchDesc: Learn how to research like a real scientist.
whyJoin.speakingDesc: Debate ideas with other brilliant students.
whyJoin.teamworkDesc: Develop leadership while collaborating in teams.
